mapper.sql: /*[TsysAdmGrpRol.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT GRP_ROL_ID , GRP_ROL_NM , US_YN , APL_ST_DT , APL_ED_DT , CRTR_ID , CRT_DTTM , UPDR_ID , UPD_DTTM FROM TSYS_ADM_GRP_ROL WHERE GRP_ROL_ID = #{grp_rol_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT GR.GRP_ROL_ID , GR.GRP_ROL_NM , GR.US_YN , GR.APL_ST_DT , GR.APL_ED_DT , DATE_FORMAT(GR.APL_ST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS F_APL_ST_DT , DATE_FORMAT(GR.APL_ED_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS F_APL_ED_DT , GR.CRTR_ID , GR.CRT_DTTM , GR.UPDR_ID , GR.UPD_DTTM , DATE_FORMAT(GR.UPD_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS F_UPD_DTTM , GR.SRT_SEQ FROM TSYS_ADM_GRP_ROL GR WHERE 1 = 1 AND US_YN = 'Y' AND GR.GRP_ROL_ID != '21' ORDER BY GR.SRT_SEQ
